songs.title: Next To You
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ohh
Doo doo doo doo doo
Right next to you
Next to you

[Verse 1]
You're the kind of person I remember seeing before
Your pretty face is one that I'll always adore
You have the eyes that'll close whenever you kiss me
Because love makes us whatever we want to be

[Pre-Chorus]
How do I breathe?
How do I sleep?
With, you not beside me
You're all the things I could not see
But now they're in front of me

[Chorus]
When I'm right next to you
Right next to you
Yeah, no matter what I do
I wanna be next to you
When I'm right next to you
Right next to you

[Verse 2]
When I saw you on that richside on that one particular day
I was really hoping and wondering if you'd ever look my way
So I got up from my seat but you had already passed me by
If only I got there earlier and not lost in your eyes

[Pre-Chorus]
How do I breathe?
How do I sleep?
With, you not beside me
You're all the things I could not see
But now they're in front of me

[Chorus]
When I'm right next to you
Right next to you
Yeah, no matter what I do
I wanna be next to you
When I'm right next to you
Right next to you

[Verse 3]
I'll promise one day I'll be
And maybe one day you'll see
That you belong to me
Baby, baby
I don't know what to do
And it only helps when I'm sitting right next to you
Sitting right next to you

[Chorus]
When I'm right next to you
Right next to you
Yeah, no matter what I do
I wanna be next to you
When I'm right next to you
Right next to you

[Outro]
Da-da
Da-da-da-da-da-da
Right next to you
Da-da
Da-da-da-da-da-da
Right, next to you
